Package org.sat4j.tools.counting

Class ParityConstraintGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sat4j.tools.counting.ParityConstraintGenerator
  • public class ParityConstraintGenerator
extends Object
    This class allows to generate and manage random parity constraints for the ApproxMC algorithm.
    Author:
    Romain Wallon

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ParityConstraintGenerator​(ISolver solver, SamplingSet samplingSet)
      Creates a new ParityConstraintGenerator.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void activate()
      Activates all the constraints that have been generated.
      void activate​(int nb)
      Activates the first nb constraints that have been generated.
      void clear()
      Clears the generated constraints from the solver.
      void deactivate()
      Deactivates all the constraints that have been generated.
      void deactivate​(int nb)
      Deactivates the first nb constraints that have been generated.
      void generate​(int nb)
      Generates nb parity constraints, and adds them to the solver.
      Xor getConstraint​(int i)
      Gives the i-th parity constraint managed by this generator.
      int nbConstraints()
      Gives the number of constraints that are managed by this generator.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ParityConstraintGenerator

        public ParityConstraintGenerator​(ISolver solver,
                                 SamplingSet samplingSet)
        Creates a new ParityConstraintGenerator.
        Parameters:
        solver - The solver in which parity constraints are added.
        samplingSet - The set of variables to consider in the parity constraints.

    • Method Detail

      • nbConstraints

        public int nbConstraints()
        Gives the number of constraints that are managed by this generator.
        Returns:
        The number of constraints.

      • generate

        public void generate​(int nb)
        Generates nb parity constraints, and adds them to the solver. The constraints are all activated.
        Parameters:
        nb - The number of constraints to generate.

      • getConstraint

        public Xor getConstraint​(int i)
        Gives the i-th parity constraint managed by this generator.
        Parameters:
        i - The index of the constraint to get.
        Returns:
        The i-th constraint.

      • deactivate

        public void deactivate()
        Deactivates all the constraints that have been generated. They are not removed from the solver.

      • deactivate

        public void deactivate​(int nb)
        Deactivates the first nb constraints that have been generated. They are not removed from the solver.
        Parameters:
        nb - The number of constraints to deactivate

      • activate

        public void activate()
        Activates all the constraints that have been generated.

      • activate

        public void activate​(int nb)
        Activates the first nb constraints that have been generated.
        Parameters:
        nb - The number of constraints to activate

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears the generated constraints from the solver.
